Index.h1: All-in-one Figma Plugin for Image Compression & Upload
Index.h2: A local compression export tool based on WebAssembly supporting PNG, JPG, WEBP, SVG, AVIF
Index.h3: Local compression | Quick and efficient | Privacy protection
Index.featureBefore: This is a free Figma plugin designed to help you quickly compress and upload images for use on the web.

Index.feature3Desc: One-click compression export, no need to leave Figma
